name: gemini-schedule-demo
description: A demo application showing how to use Google's Gemini API to create captions for posts

scripts.manual: npm run build && node -e "require('./dist/birdposting-tests.js').testManualPosting().catch(e=>{console.error('❌ Error:', e.message); process.exit(1)})"
scripts.llm: npm run build && node -e "require('./dist/birdposting-tests.js').testLLMAugmentation().catch(e=>{console.error('❌ Error:', e.message); process.exit(1)})"
scripts.mixed: npm run build && node -e "require('./dist/birdposting-tests.js').testMixedEditing().catch(e=>{console.error('❌ Error:', e.message); process.exit(1)})"
scripts.vague: npm run build && node -e "require('./dist/birdposting-tests.js').testVagueDraftCaption().catch(e=>{console.error('❌ Error:', e.message); process.exit(1)})"
scripts.casual: npm run build && node -e "require('./dist/birdposting-tests.js').testCasualCaption().catch(e=>{console.error('❌ Error calling Gemini API:', e.message); process.exit(1)})"
scripts.sad: npm run build && node -e "require('./dist/birdposting-tests.js').testSadderCaption().catch(e=>{console.error('❌ Error:', e.message); process.exit(1)})"

author: Student Demo
